member.name: _name
member.description: Optional, give the entity a name. This can help with debugging and with serialising the entity.

member.name: componentAdded
member.description: This signal is dispatched when a component is added to the entity.

member.name: componentRemoved
member.description: This signal is dispatched when a component is removed from the entity.

member.name: nameChanged
member.description: Dispatched when the name of the entity changes. Used internally by the engine to track entities based on their names.

params.name: name
params.description: The name for the entity. If left blank, a default name is assigned with the form _entityN where N is an integer.
